text: satyavisvasikale, ninnalute kaikalkeantum sulannal keantum vettayatippitikkavunna vidhattilulla valla jantukkalum mukhena allahu ninnale pariksikkuka tanne ceyyum. adrsyamaya nilayil allahuve bhayappetunnavare avan vertiriccariyan ventiyatre atâ€Œ. vallavanum atin sesam atikramam kaniccal avann vedanayeriya siksayuntayirikkum
